715859f-a.text:
Avenue A, north from East 6th Street.  At the right is a motion picture house, Loews Hollywood Theatre.  Tomkins Square occupies the entire three blocks to the north. Note the bus service that replaces the former trolley line.  Track removal and surface repavement has been performed by the W.P.A.
										   May 17, 1937

Works Progress Administration
Five Boroughs Project

715860f-a.text:
Avenue A, South East. South of 6th Street
Neg. no A-1355
P.L. Sperr, photographer
June 26, 1941
